title: Are cardiovascular and cardio the same? - Quora

response.answer_text: Cardio means Heart And vascular means vessels Heart supply the blood through the vascular system, arteries, . The body has vast vascular system of arteries, veins , capalaries The Vascular System , also called the circulatory system, the system made up vessels that carry blood and lymph through the body. The arteries and veins carry blood throughout the body, delivering oxygen and nutrients to the body tissues and taking away the by products of body. The system make whole system is called cardio vascular system .heart and vascular
